大家好，

在一條名為「升學」的道路，你是如何思考和抉擇的呢？
是否習慣尋找「標準答案」，是否會被許多的「聲音」所影響呢？

許多東華人是「偶然」來到花蓮這塊土地的。
在花東求學、生活的日子，給予我們機會重新認識這塊土地，而土地也默默地滋養著我們，這裡的山海環境、美麗的校園、師長和同伴，共同交織出我們對大學的響往。離開時，總有那麼一些讓人懷念的地方啊！雖然難以言喻自己具體改變了什麼，不過，感覺確實不一樣了，一種意料之外、充滿生命力的蛻變！

無論最後的決定如何，希望你聆聽內心的聲音，勇敢的向前、大膽的挑戰，
並且相信自己的選擇。

影片連結：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LZfpUihjDRs 

Dear all,

On the journey called "Higher Education", how do you think and make decisions? 
Are you accustomed to seeking "standard answers," or do you get swayed by many "voices"? 

Many Dong Hwa individuals found themselves in Hualien by "accident." 
The days spent studying and living in Hualien provided us with the opportunity to rediscover this land, the land that silently nurtures us. The mountains and seas, the beautiful campus, faculty members, and peers collectively weave our yearning for university life. Upon leaving, there will always be things that hold a special place in our hearts. Although it isn’t easy to express what has changed, there is indeed a different feeling, an unexpected and lively transformation! 

Regardless of the final decision, we hope you listen to the voice within, move forward courageously, face challenges boldly, and believe in your choices.
